panels.description: 'n' is the number of processes watched by the agent (default: 10 processes)
panels.title: Top 'n' memory hungry node processes (LIVE)
Node CPU clock speed in GHz

panels.description: Cumulative time (in microseconds) that tasks have been stalled due to memory pressure since system boot
panels.title: Node PSI memory

panels.description: Cumulative time (in microseconds) that tasks have been stalled due to cpu pressure since system boot
panels.title: Node PSI CPU
Total node byte sent/received over the network
Total node packets sent/received over the network

panels.description: Node disk read speed. This is cumulative, across all disks discovered by the agent
panels.title: Node disk read speed in bytes/s

panels.description: Node disk write speed. This is cumulative, across all disks discovered by the agent
panels.title: Node disk write speed in bytes/s

panels.description: Total read operations across all disks. This is cumulative
panels.title: Node disk total bytes read ops

panels.description: Total write operations across all disks. This is cumulative.
panels.title: Node disk total bytes write ops

panels.description: Total bytes read from all disks. This is cumulative, across all disks discovered
panels.title: Node disk total bytes read

panels.description: Total bytes write from all disks. This is cumulative, across all disks discovered
panels.title: Node disk total bytes write

panels.description: Cumulative time (in microseconds) that tasks have been stalled due to disk pressure since system boot
panels.title: Node PSI Disk I/O
